org.jgentleframework.core.handling
Interface AnnotationRegister

All Known Subinterfaces:
ServiceHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationRegisterImpl, ServiceHandlerImpl
public interface AnnotationRegister

Provides some methods in order to manage registered annotations and their validators (AnnotationValidator).

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Method Detail

addValidator

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> void addValidator(java.lang.Class<T> anno,
                                                              AnnotationValidator<T> validator)
Adds an AnnotationValidator according to specified registered annotation

Note: if previous AnnotationValidator of annotation is existed, it will be replaced by new AnnotationValidator

Parameters:
anno - đối tượng object class của annotation.
validator - đối tượng validator tương ứng chỉ định.

clearAllAnnotationRegistered

void clearAllAnnotationRegistered()
Removes all registered annotations.

getValidatorlist

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>,AnnotationValidator<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>> getValidatorlist()
Returns a HashMap containing all registered AnnotationValidators

isAnnotationListEmpty

boolean isAnnotationListEmpty()
Returns true if registered annotation list is empty, false otherwise.

isRegisteredAnnotation

boolean isRegisteredAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> anno)
Returns true if given annotation is registered, false otherwise.

Parameters:
anno - the object class of annotation need to be tested.

Registers an annotation

Parameters:

registerAnnotation

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> void registerAnnotation(java.lang.Class<T> anno,
                                                                    AnnotationValidator<T> validator)
Registers an annotation and its validator.

Parameters:
anno - the object class of annotation need to be registered.
validator - the AnnotationValidator need to be registered.

removeValidator

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> void removeValidator(AnnotationValidator<T> validator)
Removes a specified AnnotationValidator

Parameters:
validator - the AnnotationValidator need to be removed.

removeValidator

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> void removeValidator(java.lang.Class<T> anno)
Removes a specified AnnotationValidator of given annotation.

Parameters:
anno - the object class of annotation.

subListAnnoRegistered

java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>> subListAnnoRegistered(int fromIndex,
                                                                                                 int toIndex)
Returns a sub list of registered annotations.

Parameters:
fromIndex - the begin if index
toIndex - the end of index
Returns:
the list< class>

unregisterAnnotation

void unregisterAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> anno)
Unregisters given annotation.

By default, if an registered annotation is unregistered, its validator will also be unregistered.

Parameters:
anno - the object class of annotation need to be unregistered

Returns the number of all registered annotations.

int
